languages.text: [Успокоить молитвой] "...Император с нами, покуда мы помним свое предназначение — служить Человечеству и не поддаваться врагу..."

traits.locale_text: [Успокоить молитвой] "...Император с нами, покуда мы помним свое предназанчение — служить Человечеству и не поддаваться врагу..."

languages.text: [Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."
languages.original_text: [Успокоить молитвой] "...Император с нами, покуда мы помним свое предназначение — служить Человечеству и не поддаваться врагу..."

traits.locale_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose, and it is to serve Humankind, never to give in to its enemies..."
[Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose, and it is to serve Humankind, never to give in to its enemies..."
[Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose and it is to serve Humankind, to never give in to its enemies..."
[Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose and it is to serve Humankind, to never give in to its enemies..."
[Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."
[Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."

languages.text: ［祈りで彼女をなだめる］「…目的を忘れない限り、皇帝は我々と共におられる。つまりそれは人類に奉仕し、決して敵に屈しないということだ…」
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."

traits.locale_text: ［祈りで彼女をなだめる］「…目的を忘れない限り、皇帝は我々と共におられる。つまりそれは人類に奉仕し、決して敵に屈しないということだ…」

languages.text: [通过祈祷让她冷静下来]“……只要我们还记得我们的目标，侍奉人类，绝对不向敌人屈服，那么帝皇就永远与我们同在……”
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."

traits.locale_text: [通过祈祷让她冷静下来]“……只要我们还记得我们的目标，侍奉人类，绝对不向敌人屈服，那么帝皇就永远与我们同在……”

languages.text: [Calmarla con una oración] «...El Emperador estará con nosotros mientras recordemos nuestro propósito: servir a la Humanidad sin ceder nunca ante sus enemigos...».
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."

traits.locale_text: [Calmarla con una oración] «...El Emperador estará con nosotros mientras recordemos nuestro propósito: servir a la Humanidad sin ceder nunca ante sus enemigos...».

languages.text: [Ihr durch ein Gebet Linderung verschaffen] "Der Imperator ist bei uns, so lange wir uns an unseren Zweck erinnern ... der Menschheit zu dienen, ihren Feinden niemals nachzugeben ..."
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."

traits.locale_text: [Ihr durch ein Gebet Linderung verschaffen] "Der Imperator ist bei uns, so lange wir uns an unseren Zweck erinnern, nämlich der Menschheit zu dienen, niemals ihren Feinden nachzugeben ..."

languages.text: [L'apaiser avec une prière] « ... L'Empereur demeurera à nos côtés tant que nous n'oublierons pas notre raison d'être : servir l'humanité, et ne jamais céder face à ses ennemis... »
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."

traits.locale_text: [L'apaiser avec une prière] « ... L'Empereur demeurera à nos côtés tant que nous n'oublierons pas notre raison d'être : servir l'humanité, ne jamais céder face à ses ennemis... »

languages.text: [Dua ederek Cassia'yı sakinleştir] "...Vazifemizi hatırladığımız müddetçe İmparator yanımızdadır... Vazifemiz, İnsanlığa hizmet edip düşmanlarımıza teslim olmamaktır..."
languages.original_text: [Soothe her with prayer] "...The Emperor is with us so long as we remember our purpose — to serve Humankind and to never give in to its enemies..."

traits.locale_text: [Dua ederek Cassia'yı sakinleştir] "... Vazifemizi hatırladığımız müddetçe İmparator yanımızdadır... Vazifemiz, İnsanlığa hizmet etip düşmanlarımıza teslim olmamaktır..."
